meanings.definition: A person who defeats or beats someone in a competition or fight.
meanings.sent1: The trouncer in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The trouncer celebrated their victory with a big smile.
meanings.sent3: The trouncer at the game was so fast, they made it look easy!
meanings.sent4: She was a trouncer on the basketball court, dominating every game.
meanings.sent5: The trouncer's skill was unmatched, leaving their opponents in awe.

meanings.definition: To defeat or beat someone decisively in a competition or fight.
meanings.sent1: The team managed to trounce their opponents in the final match.
meanings.sent2: He trounced his rival in the chess tournament with strategic moves.
meanings.sent3: The cat trounced the mouse in the game of chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: The storm trounced the city, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The teacher trounced the difficult math problem, solving it in seconds.
